Models¶

Natural question / answers pairs generation full process depends on 2 NLP models:

  • For NER / Named Entity Recognition it relies on SpaCy french model

  • For Constituency Parsing it relies on Benepar french constituency parser

Installation¶

Ensure your the virtual environnement you’re using is activated.

Both model can be installed with the command::

uqa download all

The command will install:

  • SpaCy fr_core_news_md model, the biggest of the 2 pre-trained french available models

  • Benepar benepar_fr model, the single pre-trained french model available.
